jobDescription: As a (Senior) Technical Data Analyst you will be expected to demonstrate superior problem solving skills and logical thinking, and have knowledge of how to analyze data. Job Responsibilities: • Perform data analysis and other general business analysis tasks Use data analytical tools and the SQL languageApply problem solving skills in order to understand and solve data analytical problemsHave the ability to diagnose problems with complex data flowsLearn new skills, make timely decisions, and adapt well to change Position Requirements: • 3-5+ years as a data analyst; any healthcare industry experience is a plusDemonstrated ability to solve problems and think logically and analyticallyFacility with dealing with complex data setsAbility to understand processes and workflowsStrong communication skillsSQL experience is a plusExperience with data analytical tools such as SQL, SPSS, and use of ExcelMicrosoft Office experience (Word, PowerPoint, Excel, Visio)Electronic Health Record (EHR) systems experience Education:Bachelor’s Degree (Economics, Mathematics, Computer Science, Engineering, or other analytical discipline) or equivalent experience  Azara offers a full suite of medical plans, 401(k) plan, 10 company holidays, 4 weeks of paid vacation time and other benefits in addition to a competitive salary. If you are interested in applying for any of the Azara career opportunities, please send a cover letter and resume to careers@azarahealthcare.com.
